attributes.action: Replace the unfair Council tax with a more fair Community charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Several wage earners living in one property pay the same council tax as two people, not necessarily wage earners, living in one property. Councils offer or need to offer many services such as education, police, fire service, library, refuse collection etc. All consumers, with some exceptions eg children etc., should pay equally for these services.
